title: The Galaxy Watch Ultra 2 could be on its way – and it's gearing up to challenge Apple's Ultra 3
description: Samsung is reportedly working on the Galaxy Watch Ultra 2, a rugged flagship smartwatch that could take on Apple’s Ultra 3.
content: In 2024, Samsung launched the Galaxy Watch Ultra, its super-premium flagship answer to the Apple Watch Ultra. This year, the company refreshed the model with 64GB of storage instead of 32, and re-rel… [+3429 chars]
